name: No-Destination-Full
title: Disable Destination Full Message
author: RockPaperKatana
description: STOP TALKING ABOUT DESTINATION FULL! I'M TIRED OF SEEING IT! I was putting down a train station, right, and ALL the trains just flashes "Destination Full". I played space exploration mod, and built a giant base with train limits, and everywhere I go, there were "Destination Full"! DESTINATION FULL DESTINATION FULL DESTINATION FULL DESTINATION FULL DESTINATION FULL!!!!!!!!!! AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA
